text: @GovernorTomWolf This man also yelled at me about #COVID19 saying all of it is lies&THEY just want our money. How could anyone want  to get more money THIS way? Businesses and individuals are suffering. Government is giving out more money on all levels through the crisis that some keep EXTENDING
